title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Documentation and Resources
content:

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module > Product Description > RAK12004 Gas Sensor Module Overview
content: The RAK12004 is a gas sensor module, part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. The sensor used is the MQ2 from Zhengzhou Winsen Electronics.
parent_content: The RAK12004 is a gas sensor module, part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. The sensor used is the MQ2 from Zhengzhou Winsen Electronics.

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module > Prerequisites > RAK12004 Setup Requirements
content:
To use a **RAK12004**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** and a **Li-Ion/LiPo Battery** to plug the module in. The **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12004** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12004**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** and a **Li-Ion/LiPo Battery** to plug the module in. The **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12004** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
